appName: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex
display_name: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex
display_long_description:
Face the Dark Vortex in a fantasy VR adventure where puzzles, magic, and combat collide in a world consumed by darkness.

Wield powerful weapons—two swords, a bow, and a shield—and defeat ancient bosses like the mighty golem and the fire-breathing dragon. Master their spells to enchant your gear and unlock new zones filled with deadlier threats.

Choose your combat style: dual-wield swords, mix sword and shield, or rain down magical arrows from a distance. Adapt your strategy to every enemy and terrain.

Explore ancient castles, crumbling temples, and cursed fortresses where the environment itself becomes part of the challenge. Every puzzle solved brings you one step closer to the truth behind the Vortex.

Visually stunning and handcrafted for VR, Tales of Sintra blends dark dungeons with majestic landscapes for a truly immersive experience.

Tales of Sintra is a VR sword-fighting and magic adventure with exploration, boss battles, and environmental puzzles designed for immersive gameplay.
